issue.title: Allow stepping the simulator in paused state

content.raw:
I think [this line](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/src/dd4ff2a4c1112a8727c12a2e927e87ca64392611/src/SimulationRunner.cc#lines-646) is the culprit. I believe the intention is for iterations to only count if they affect sim time (i.e. not paused).

I remember [way back](#!/ignitionrobotics/ign-gazebo/pull-requests/33/) I proposed the concept of "ECS iterations" separate from "Sim iterations", but we ended up only having "Sim iterations" for now. I'm open to revisiting the concept of "ECS iterations" if people find it useful.
